thread.section_title: Travel news, tips and features - San Francisco Chronicle
thread.title: Edinburgh’s Royal Mile
thread.title_full: Edinburgh’s Royal Mile - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Rick Steves
title: Edinburgh’s Royal Mile
text:
Photo: Rick Steves The Royal Mile offers a leisurely and fascination-filled stroll through history, souvenir shops, and tourists. The Royal Mile offers a leisurely and fascination-filled stroll...
There’s no better introduction to Edinburgh — the historical, cultural and political capital of Scotland — than a walk straight down the spine of the old town. Stretching from a hill-topping castle to a queen’s palace, this ramble is appropriately called the Royal Mile. Despite being crammed with tourists, it’s one of Europe’s best sightseeing walks. The Royal Mile offers a leisurely and fascination-filled stroll through history, souvenir shops, and tourists. The Royal Mile offers a leisurely and fascination-filled stroll...
